definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Na 3:3 horseman (i.e. *parrâš, cf. Ges:§ 84 b.b; Ar. fa0risun; Eth. faras:: Aram. [[פָּרָשׁ]] pro4o0);—abs. ~p Na 3:3, Je 4:29, also [[פָּרַשׁ]] Ez Eze 26:10 (as if cstr. Kö:Synt. § 337 s); Pl. [[פָּרָשָׁים]] Ge 50:9 +; sf. [[פָּרָשָׁיו]] Ex 14:9 +;—horseman, usu. pl., esp. + [[רֶכֶב]] charioty: Egyptain Ge 50:9 (J), Jos 24:6 (E), Ex 14:9, Ex 14:17, Ex 14:18, Ex 14:23, Ex 14:26, Ex 14:28 (all P), Ex 15:19 (song), Is 31:1, 2Ki 18:34 = Is 36:9, 2Ch 12:3 cf. 2Ch 16:8; Philistine 1Sa 13:5, 2Sa 1:6 (del. [[בַּעֲלֵי]] Targum We Dr Bu HPS); Aramaean 2Sa 10:18 (but read prob. [[אִישׁ]], cf. [[ְ]] 1Ch 19:18, We Dr al.), and (+ [[אִישׁ רַגְלִי]]) 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4, cf. 1Ch 19:6; also [[עַל־סוּס וּפָרָשִׁים]] 1Ki 20:20 (si vera l.) Isr., of Adonijah 1Ki 1:5 (+ [[רֶכֶב]] [[חֲמִשִּׁים אִישׁ רָחִים]]; Solomon + [[רֶכֶב]] 1Ki 9:19, 1Ki 9:22, 1Ki 10:26 = 2Ch 8:6, 2Ch 8:9, 2Ch 1:14, 2Ch 1:14, Prob also 1Ki 5:6 ( + [[סוּסִים לְמֶרְכָּבוֹ]]) = 2Ch 9:25 (+ [[סוּסִים]] [[וּמֶרְכָּכוֹת]]); Jehoahaz 2Ki 13:7 (+ [[רַגְלִי]]); + [[רֶכֶב]], fig. of Elijah 2Ki 2:12, of Elisha 2Ki 13:14; + [[סוּסִים]] Ho 1:7; Assyrian Is 22:6, Is 22:7 (+ [[רֶכֶב]]), cf. Na 3:3, [[רִכְבֵי סוּסִים]] ´[[פ]] Ez Eze 23:6, Eze 23:12 Babylonian Hb Hab 1:8, Hab 1:8, Je 4:29 (+ [[רׂמֵה קֶשֶׁת]]), Ez Eze 26:7 (+ [[סוּס]]), [[רֶכֶב]]), v:Eze 26:10 (+ [[גַּלְגַּל וָרֶכֶב]]), Scythian (Gog) Eze 38:4 (+ [[סוּסִים]]); Persian Is 21:7, Is 21:9 (´[[חֶמֶד פ]]), Ne 2:9, Ezr 8:22; of kings of north Da 11:40 (+ [[רֶכֶב]]).
